# mediaContainer

**Instance Property**

The media item container.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var mediaContainer: INMediaItem? { get }
```

## Discussion

A container consists of one or more pieces of media content such as a playlist or album. You set [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPlayMediaIntent/mediaContainer] when creating the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPlayMediaIntent] object.



## Accessing Media Items

- **mediaItems**: The media content.
title: mediaContainer
